mean_cn: adj. 敌人的，对手的，对抗的
mean_en: involving two people or two sides who oppose each other
word_etyma: adversar(y)对手 + ial形容词后缀 → adversarial 对手的
short_phrase: an adversarial relationship between red and blue people
sentence: Why do the red and blue teams have to be so adversarial and competitive?
sentence_trans: 为什么红绿两队如此敌对？
